answers.answer: Hi,I don't know of any support group specifically,  though heart issues are very common with diabetes.  Certainly I can understand your anxiety.  My mum is now facing heart surgery.  She found it very reassuring to speak to others who have gone through the same.Keep yourself busy so you don't dwell on it too much. manage your blood sugars very well which will help your recovery.Come back and let us know how you are going.

question: Are there any support groups out there where I could talk to people who have been through heart surgery. I'm dealing with it the best way I can. I have a lot of faith and I'm trying to be strong, although the depression and anxiety comes and goes. Any help would be appreciated.
title: Looking for Support Groups for Heart dieseas and Type 2 Diabetes
